sect1.title: Needed Patches
sect1.para: In addition to the packages, several patches are also required. These patches correct any mistakes in the packages that should be fixed by the maintainer. In addition to the above required patches, there exist a number of optional patches created by the CLFS community. These optional patches solve minor problems or enable functionality that is not enabled by default.
